channel.title: Disney on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Disney on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:137 Chances: Disney’s new lineup of experiences at its flagship resort showcases its commitment to doubling its parks investment over the next decade, indicating a focus on growth and customer experience. The company’s stricter measures against the sharing of streaming platform passwords are expected to aid subscriber growth in the near term, demonstrating an effort to drive revenue and bolster its streaming service.
